Module io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api
Package io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api

Interface Contracts

All Superinterfaces:
AutoOpen
public interface Contracts extends AutoOpen
The actual implementation used for Contracts itself. It is used to bootstrap Contracts without it knowing the implementation if Contracts. It does know how to load the default from contracts-impl. However, the design is open to have it replaced with an alternative implementation.

  • Method Details

    • claim

      <T> T claim(Contract<T> contract)
      Claim the deliverable from a bound contract.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of value returned
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to claim
      Returns:
      the value returned by the bound Promisor. A Promisor can return null
      Throws:
      ContractException - if Promisor binding does not exist for the contract
      SecurityException - if permission is denied

    • isBound

      <T> boolean isBound(Contract<T> contract)
      Checks if the contract is bound to a Promisor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value returned by the promisor
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to check
      Returns:
      true iif bound

    • bind

      default <T> AutoClose bind(Contract<T> contract, Promisor<T> promisor)
      Establish a binding between a Contract and a Promisor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value returned by the promisor
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to bind the Promisor
      promisor - the Promisor for the given contract
      Returns:
      Use to release (unbind) this contract
      Throws:
      ContractException - when contract is already bound and can't be replaced
      SecurityException - when permission to bind is denied

    • bind

      <T> AutoClose bind(Contract<T> contract, Promisor<T> promisor, BindStrategy bindStrategy)
      Establish a binding between a Contract and a Promisor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value returned by the promisor
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to bind the Promisor
      promisor - the Promisor for the given contract
      bindStrategy - the binding strategy
      Returns:
      Use to release (unbind) this contract
      Throws:
      ContractException - when contract is already bound and can't be replaced
      SecurityException - when permission to bind is denied
